company.name: Genies Career Hub
company.overview: An innovative career development platform launched in 2024 that seamlessly integrates artificial intelligence and technology with traditional career coaching methodologies
company.evolution: Evolved from Career Genies, which was established in 2021 as part of The Career Genies Group
company.mission: Super Charge Your Career Potential - Genies Career Hub has a passion to mentor individuals on their entire career path, helping them realize what they want to do, how to get into that career, and utilizing experts to guide them on how to excel within it

details.head_office: The Career Genies Group UK LTD, 124 City Road, London, EC1V 2NX

genies_pro_cv_studio.description: A comprehensive AI-driven suite of three pioneering tools for CV creation and optimization

features: Create professional CVs from scratch using AI technology
Choose from unlimited professional templates
Fill in personal details including name, job title, email, and professional information
AI-powered faster approach to CV building
Customized Curriculum Vitae templates aligned with professional profiles
ATS-friendly resume formats that pass Application Tracking System scanners
AI-powered CV analysis and optimization
Enhanced CVs with keyword and format optimized content
Ensures ATS CV Checker approval
Professional insights integration for better performance
Eliminates CV rejections due to ATS incompatibility
Matches job titles or professions to prepare tailored CV templates
Provides profession-specific CV templates
Option to start fresh or use existing templates
Finds exact CVs tailored to individual profiles using AI
Customized profile analysis for better job matching

internship_program.description: Comprehensive internship placement and discovery service to kickstart careers

Gain real-world experience through structured internship placements

Professional development through hands-on experience
Bridge between academic learning and professional practice
Mentorship opportunities during internship placements
Industry exposure and practical skill development

limitations_and_scope.beyond_scope_notice: For any queries or assistance beyond career growth, development, and job-related services, users should be informed that Genies Career Hub specializes specifically in career-related services and other topics may be outside their scope of expertise.
